video.title: DevOps Introduction
video.description:
What is DevOps really all about? Klaus Ita will give an introductory talk about the field of DevOps.

Talk by Klaus Ita at the FreeCodeCamp Vienna March meetup.

Recorded by Pusher.com. Check them out if you want awesome real-time tools, and subscribe to the their YouTube channel for more talks!

Pusher's channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCoyqucxoFXDFnh3khD0rjUg

--

Learn to code for free and get a developer job: https://www.freecodecamp.org

Read hundreds of articles on programming: https://medium.freecodecamp.org

topLevelComment.author: Anxhela Alushi
topLevelComment.text: 2:48 yup that twitter handle is so easy to remember

replies.author: Anxhela Alushi
replies.text: tip: to find him on twitter type 8129 on the search bar first, then start adding f-s at the start one by one until his profile pops up in the suggestions

topLevelComment.author: JOHN
topLevelComment.text: close your eyes you can hear Arnold

replies.author: U MadBro yo
replies.text: Open your eyes and you see his programming brother

topLevelComment.author: Isuru Nanayakkara
topLevelComment.text: Haha marketing people. You wanted that feature, YOU press the button!

topLevelComment.author: Conti Music
topLevelComment.text: Top, i think you would like my music for your videos as well, perhaps you would be intersted to use my music for your next video? Liked and followed, thank you!

topLevelComment.author: TrowSonny
topLevelComment.text: Thanks ! really helpful. I would love to see more videos on DevOps. unfortunately i can't attends those seminar :/
